message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value exceeds $1500000 to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. Given its exceptional nature, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $2000000. Please let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1500000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
